input.sql:
select distinct
opp.accountid as accountid,
opp.id Opportunity_Id,
opp.opportunitynumber__c as opportunitynumber,
acct.col_mdmid as mdmid,
acct.col_legacyaccountid as legacyaccountid,


 
  opp.Name AS Opportunity_Name,
  opp.Bill_To_Account__c,
  opp.Amount,
  opp.StageName,
  COALESCE(ebs.Id, 'NA') AS EBS_Id,
  COALESCE(ebs.Name, 'NA') AS EBS_Name,
  COALESCE(ebs.EBS_Party_Name__c, 'NA') AS EBS_Party_Name__c,
  COALESCE(ebs.EBS_Party_Number__c, 'NA') AS           EBS_Party_Number__c,
  coo.Countrycode AS COO,
  opp.Country_of_Order_Formula__c AS Cntrycd,
 
CASE 
    WHEN opp.Deal_Registration__c = TRUE THEN 'Deal Registration'
    ELSE NULL
  END AS Deal_Registration,

  CASE 
    WHEN opp.Pay_Now__c = 'Yes' THEN TRUE
    ELSE FALSE
  END AS PayNow,

  CASE 
    WHEN opp.RenewalOpportunityNumber__c IS NOT NULL THEN '0121U000001O2m0QAC'
    ELSE '0121U000001O2m1QAC'
  END AS Renewal_Status,
  
  CASE 
    WHEN opp.FulfillmentChannel__c = 'OEM' THEN 'OEM'
    ELSE pb.pricebookname  
  END AS pricebookname,
  
  contact.firstname as contactfirstname,
  contact.lastname as contactlastname,
  contact.email,
  ebs_ship_to_acct.name,
  ebs_sold_to_acct.name,
  
  opp.CloseDate as closedate,
  opp.description,
  opp.ForecastCategory,
  opp.CurrencyIsoCode,
  opp.Probability,
  opp.FulfillmentChannel__c ,
  opp.Super_Region__c,
  opp.OracleOrderNumber__c,
  opp.PONumber__c
  

from #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"db804506","path":["list_name"]}')} as opp
left join #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"965d69ac","path":["list_name"]}')} as acct 
on opp.accountid = acct.col_legacyaccountid

LEFT JOIN #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"69852474","path":["list_name"]}')} AS ebs
  ON opp.Bill_To_Account__c = ebs.Id
  
  LEFT Join #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"d9a816fd","path":["list_name"]}')} as coo
ON opp.Country_of_Order_Formula__c = coo.CountryOfOrder



LEFT Join #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"ffa0d368","path":["list_name"]}')} as pb on
 (opp.FulfillmentChannel__c != 'OEM' AND opp.Country_of_Order_Formula__c = pb.countryoforder)
  
  Left Join #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"a60ea243","path":["list_name"]}')} as contact
  on opp.Ship_To_Contact__c = contact.id
  
  LEFT JOIN #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"19415dc8","path":["list_name"]}')} AS ebs_ship_to_acct
  ON opp.ship_To_Account__c = ebs_ship_to_acct.Id
 
 
  LEFT JOIN   #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"77bde741","path":["list_name"]}')} as ebs_sold_to_acct
  ON opp.sold_To_Account__c = ebs_sold_to_acct.Id
  ;
